summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for, certain general municipal improvements in addition to those authorized by Ordinance No. 53688, creating an indebtedness (in the sum of One Million, Three Hundred Thousand Dollars ($1,300,000.00)), providing for a loan, and authorizing the issuance and sale of general negotiable bonds therefor in the amount of said loan, for the purpose of paying the cost and expense of those certain general municipal public improvements contemplated by said Ordinance No. 53688, and those hereby authorized, and amending Sections 1, 2, and 3 of said Ordinance No. 53688.
